title: Inverse law of fed(ness?)
body: Is being to fed a thing? Like getting so fed your team is to underfed to do anything?

replies.body: In a way. it is a bit more like putting all your eggs in one basket as you end up being the vast majority of your teams power, and if you fall then your team is just kind of average in strength.
Yes. If your team is behind and you are fed, it makes sense to give up kills (only if it's safe to do so).
